Sentencas: To reduce the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells, structures with thin films electrolytes, deposited by spray coating on porous anode were developed.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: The slurries used for the fabrication of the films were prepared using appropriates suspensions with ytria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powers, solvents, dispersants, binders and plasticizers appropriates.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: In this work the study of the influence of the binders in the stability of the suspensions and the microstructures properties of the YSZ films were done.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: Three slurries were made with different composition of binders (0.5; 1.0 and 2.0 % in weight).
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: All of them showed pseudo-plastics and thixotropics flow behavior, according to viscosities measurements and shear rate.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: The films were sintered to 1500 degrees C /6 hours.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: The images of scanning electron micrographs (SEM) were treated by Quantikov program to determine the porosity of the film and average grain size of YSZ.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: The films showed adequate porosity for being used as SOFC electrolyte (between 0.2 and 0.4%) and average grain size between 2.0 and 6.0 mu m.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte

Sentencas: The spray coating is a suitable technique to fabricate the YSZ electrolytes for SOFC.
Titulo: Microstructural and rheological properties of ZrO2/Y2O3 electrolyte
